modShortDescription: Remember the good old times, when you shot a zombie in the leg, it could make them to a crawler? This is now back! Also working for demolitioner zombies.
modDescription:
Remember the good old times, when you shot a zombie in the leg, it could make them to a crawler? This is now back – same values like before: With a 17.5% chance, you can dismember the leg of a zombie, and make them crawl.

Also working for demolitioner [zombies](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-zombies/). But not working for all (Claymore really wanted to have it to work on all, but not way) Wights and cops still are not able to get their limbs dismembered (except the head).

Compatibility: A18+

**Changelog**  
\-Script didn’t apply for reasons. Fixed.

[Download](https://www.mediafire.com/file/xialhnodcpb46m2/Claymore_Leg_Crawlers_Are_Back.zip)

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/15031-claymores-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Claymore](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/claymore/)
